projects.name: MGW Rest API Plugin
projects.description: MGW Rest API Plugin for MyBB 1.8.x - A modern, secure REST API plugin for MyBB that provides database proxy connections and user information endpoints with enterprise-grade features.

projects.name: MGW Hide Content Plugin
projects.description: MGW Hide Content Plugin for MyBB 1.8.x - Advanced content hiding plugin that allows hiding post content from specific user groups using customizable BBCode tags.
